      • getStyleAt

        public S getStyleAt(int charIdx)
        Returns style at the given character position. If charIdx < 0, returns the style at the beginning of this line. If charIdx >= this.length(), returns the style at the end of this line.

      • split

        public Paragraph<S>[] split(int pos)
        Splits this line at the given position. Returns an array of 2 new Lines, corresponding to the left and right side of the split position. After return, the content of this line is undefined.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string content of this line.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
